A

add(int, int) - 接口中的方法 Money
A method to add a money amount with another given as a separate dollar and cent value
add(int, int) - 类中的方法 SimpleMoney
A method to add a money amount with another given as a separate dollar and cent value if (dollars 无效输入：'<' 0) throw IllegalArgumentException if (cents 无效输入：'<' 0 || cents >= 100) throw IllegalArgumentException Set newDollar = this.dollar + dollars Set newCent = this.dollar + cents if (newCent >= 100) Move this one dollar to newDollar and keep cent 无效输入：'<' 100
add(Money) - 接口中的方法 Money
A method to add two money amounts
add(Money) - 类中的方法 SimpleMoney
A method to add two money amounts otherAmount = other.getDecimalValue(); Set newDollar = this.dollar + other.dollar Set newCent = this.dollar + other.cent if (newCent >= 100) Move this one dollar to newDollar and keep cent 无效输入：'<' 100
